configuration_schema.description: Configuration model information of protect group list.

protect-group-list.description: The configuration information of protect group list, depend zxr10-tunnel-group and zxr10-l2vpn.

group-list.description: Configure protect group list.ID of tunnel protect group list is between [1,x], ID of PW protect group list is between [y+1,z].The value of x,y and z depends on the performance parameters, the default value of x is 4096, the default value of y is 4096, the default value of z is 8192.

group-list-id.description: Configure ID of protect group list.

type.description: You can configure tunnel protect group list or PW protect group list.

tunnel-group.description: Configure tunnel protect group list.The maximum number of tunnel protect group list instance depends on the performance parameter, the default value is 4096.The maximum member number each tunnel protect group list depends on the performance parameter, the default value is 32, one master tunnel group and 31 slave tunnel groups.The maximum member number of all tunnel protect group list depends on the performance parameter, the default value is 8192.

master-tunnel-group-id.description: Configure master tunnel group of tunnel protect group list.Each tunnel protect group list can only configure one master tunnel group.

slave-tunnel-groups.description: Configure slave tunnel groups of tunnel protect group list.The maximum member number each tunnel protect group list depends on the performance parameter, the default value is 32, one master tunnel group and 31 slave tunnel groups.Because each tunnel protect group list can only configure one master tunnel group,so the slave tunnel group number depends on the performance parameter too.

slave-tunnel-group.description: Configure slave tunnel group of tunnel protect group list.

pw-group.description: Configure PW protect group list.The maximum number of PW protect group list instance depends on the performance parameter, the default value is 4096.The maximum member number each PW protect group list depends on the performance parameter, the default value is 32, one master PW group and 31 slave PW groups.The maximum member number of all PW protect group list depends on the performance parameter, the default value is 8192.

master-pw-group-name.description: Configure master PW group of PW protect group list.Each PW protect group list can only configure one master PW group.

slave-pw-groups.description: Configure slave PW groups of PW protect group list.The maximum member number each PW protect group list depends on the performance parameter, the default value is 32, one master PW group and 31 slave PW groups.Because each PW protect group list can only configure one master PW group,so the slave PW group number depends on the performance parameter too.

slave-pw-group.description: Configure slave PW group of PW protect group list.
